resources.string: With a good melody... music gets me through everything.
Music has a poetry of its own, and that poetry is called melody.
Every soul is a melody which needs renewing.
Great melody over great riffs is, to me, the secret of it all.
I find sadness and strife to be so much more interesting with an upbeat melody.
Never be ashamed to write a melody that people remember.
Because if you\'ve got the wit, you can make anything into a melody, ultimately.
The heart of the melody can never be put down on paper.
The way I see it, there\'s only one melody for any song.
I write a melody and then change it and change it until I get it the way I like it.
